ai-iti39:1.1_0: This was said by the Buddha, the Perfected One: that is what I heard.
ai-iti39:2.1_0: “Mendicants, the Realized One, the perfected one, the fully awakened Buddha has two approaches to teaching Dhamma.
ai-iti39:2.4_0: this is the first approach to teaching Dhamma.
ai-iti39:2.5_0: ‘Having seen evil as evil, be disillusioned, dispassionate, and freed from it’—
ai-iti39:2.6_0: this is the second approach to teaching Dhamma.
ai-iti39:2.7_0: The Realized One, the perfected one, the fully awakened Buddha has these two approaches to teaching Dhamma.”
ai-iti39:2.8_0: That is what the Buddha said.
ai-iti39:3.3_0: used by the Realized One, the Buddha,
ai-iti39:4.1_0: see that that that is evil,
ai-iti39:5.1_0: This too was spoken by the Blessed One: that is what I heard.
